-------Original Message-------

From: lesliel23
Date: 05/21/06 20:02:14
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Adding links to my blog

Thank you Lesa and everyone else that sent me their blogs/websites
to link to mine. I think it's really cool to have other links so
when people visit my blog, they see that the unschooling community
it actually varied and large. I don't know many unschoolers
personally so this is my way of introducing them to unschooling
(or "life" as I like to call it!). If anyone else wants me to link
just let me know. Thank you!

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Adding links to my blog
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi Leslie, Sure--you re welcome to put links. Just for clarification, though, organiclearning is *my* blog; Connections is the ezine. Confusing because
messages.messageBody:
lesliel23 wrote:

> Danielle, can I add the organiclearning ezine link to my blog?
>

Hi Leslie,

Sure--you're welcome to put links. Just for clarification, though,
organiclearning is *my* blog; Connections is the ezine. Confusing
because Connections is at organiclearning.org. Gosh, that sounds even
more confusing.

ezine: Connections
http://connections.organiclearning.org

my blog: organic learning
http://www.organiclearning.blogspot.com

My website is in my sig line.


I had to check out where Moody was--my mom lives in Gulf Shores.


--
~~Danielle
Emily (8), Julia (7), Sam (5)
http://www.danielleconger.com/Homeschool/Welcomehome.html

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*

"With our thoughts, we make the world." ~~Buddha

to the HSB one, but may I put it on blogspot?

Thanks,
Leslie

messages.subject: Adding links to my blog
messages.msgSnippet: Danielle, can I add the organiclearning ezine link to my blog? Ren, can I add a learninginfreedom link to my blog? Anyone else with an unschooling website or
messages.messageBody:
Danielle, can I add the organiclearning ezine link to my blog?

Ren, can I add a learninginfreedom link to my blog?

Anyone else with an unschooling website or blog that would let me link
to mine? Please email me and let me know and I would be happy to link
it! Thanks!

Leslie in Moody, AL
